Strip poker? I think this world's Pinkie Pie mentioned it once.
This situation will make for a very interesting friendship report.
We'll do everything by the book, and that will make this game officially fun.
Time to make a good first impression on my fellow players!

case.state: Is it just my idea, or is that girl talking to her clothes?

case.state: Is it just my idea, or is that girl talking to her clothes?

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Do you have some kind of skin condition
case.state: Skin condition? Are you talking about ~player~? That's not very nice, Franziska...

Maybe changing ~cards~ will make this better?
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 69%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 85%!
With ~cards~ cards I should be fine.

I'll need ~cards~ for this to work.
I'll take ~cards~!
Almost perfect... One please!
I don't think I'll need it, but I'll change one...
Changing this one won't hurt...
Pretty good! I'll change one...
This hand is ready, I'll still change one just for the sake of it
Don't change a thing please!!
Oh yes! I'm fine like this...
Perfect, I won't change any cards...
By Celestia! I won't need to change cards, thank you...
Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...
4, like the number of hooves I had back home...
How about ~cards~?
~cards~ should do the trick!
Can I get ~cards~ cards over here?
Oh for Celestias... I'll take ~cards~...
Hmmm... nothing seems usefull here... ~cards~!
No good... maybe ~cards~ will fix it!
I'll take ~cards~ please...
~cards~ cards, dealer!
Don't change a thing please!!
Oh yes! I'm fine like this...
Perfect, I won't change any cards...

Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...
Don't change a thing please!!
Oh yes! I'm fine like this...
Perfect, I won't change any cards...
By Celestia! I won't need to change cards, thank you...
Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...
Are you sure you aren't giving me an advantage just because I'm from another dimension?
The girls were right. This game IS fun!
Well I'd say this is a good start.
Keep 'em coming like this and we will be safe.
Looks like someone else will be stripping this turn.
With these cards, I have a high probability of winning.
Celestia would be proud of this hand.
I've read enough about poker to know this is a great hand.
This hand is as magic as friendship!
If my calculations are right, there is no way I will lose this hand.
You can call me the princess of friendship... and poker.
My time to shine!
These cards are almost as good as a new friend!
With this hand, not even Chrysalis and her army could defeat me!
For Equestria and all the ponies I represent, I will not let this hand go to waste.
I'm the T to the WILIGHT, and ain't no other person got a hand like me. I'm Twilightlicious!
You won't be getting any more of my clothing while I have these cards!
I like your glasses, Mei! Where did you get them?
They're not exactly as exciting as reading, but they will do.
This should be enough to get me to next round.
This should be okay.
This is passable.
Back in Equestria, Rarity sometimes hosts a game where the penalty for losing a round is putting on a piece of clothing.
Hmmm, maybe if I hadn't skipped a chapter, I would have known how to get more out of this hand.
This hand is okay I guess...
Maybe I shouldn't have taken that card out? Whatever, this will work anyway.
This is fine... so long as someone else has a worse hand, you're safe, Twilight.
Focus, Twilight. You can do it.
This hand will need to work for now.
Don't give up hope yet, Twilight. You have come out of worse situations.
Think positive, Twilight. There's still a pretty big chance that one of your opponents has a worse hand.
They're not exactly as exciting as a perfect score on an exam, but they will do.
They're not exactly as exciting as a good book, but they will do.
They're not exactly as exciting as... Wait? What do you mean I'm being annoying?
Don't panic, Twilight, think of what Pinkie would do... Actually, let's not think about what Pinkie would do...
This just won't cut it.
Well this is weird.
Oh no, I didn't mean to trade that card away.
Oh no. Quick! Think of what Celestia told you to do in this situation.
Even with all I have learned, this will be a difficult situation to get out of.
We have a crisis on our hooves!
Discord is responsible for this hand, isn't he?
These cards! They're awful! They're horrible! They're tragic!
I guess I don't have all the answers...
Somewhere, someplace, Tirek is laughing at my poor luck...
I gotta think of something! Thinkthinkthinkthinkthink Twilight, think!
Oh, good. Great.
This hand is terrible, and I don't think I can come up with a counterspell in time!
Clock is ticking, Twilight... Clock... is... TICKING!
These are bad! Flim and Flam aren't behind this game, are they?
Just because everyone expects something from you doesn't mean it's guaranteed to happen.
For Celestia's sake! Who is dealing these cards!?
Come on, Twilight! You just have to keep it together. Keep. It. Together!
Just remember what Cadence told you and breathe, Twilight...
Please have something worse than me.
This was definitely not what I wanted.
Not good at all.
Well I guess I did want to wear as little clothing as possible after all.
Well, I guess I wouldn't mind getting a little more comfortable!
I want to take the chance to thank you people for helping me with my research, I'll be sure to credit everyone here!
And my name is Twilight Sparkle, Princess of Friendship and the element of magic. Pleasure to meet you too!
Awww, and I was looking forward to study your body from the front too...
Finally someone with a normal name around here, Hello Ms. Alter, my name is Twilight Sparkle!
What book said that? Tell me! I need to read it!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Sometimes "just okay" is good enough, not everything has to be perfect.
case.state: What do you mean "just okay"? You should always try to get as close to perfect as possible!
Oh, I guess we we read the same book before coming here, Corrin!
I couldn't quite catch what you said before, Corrin. Would you... uhh never mind, I'm sure it won't be too important for my investigation.
Huey is a weird name for a pegasus, though... or any type of pony in general. Did he grow on Cloudsdale or somewhere else?
"Los Angeles"? Oh! That must be this world's version of "Los Pegasus"
Woah! Where did those ropes come from? Was that what you were doing when you moved your hands before?
Don't ask me, I'm not from here either, Jura...
My name is Twilight Sparkle. Pleasure to meet you, Korra!
Don't worry Lotte, I may not have read this "Nightfall" book you speak of, but I'm always open for new reading material!
I'm pretty sure they're just "playing cards", Lotte. But if it makes you feel better, keep singing!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Were I to know clothing would play such a large part of tonightâ€™s activities
case.state: I think you look fancy enough like that, Miko!
Your consort? Ah I see! I can't wait to eventually find my own somewhere, maybe ~player~ could be a good start!
That is a handy tip. I'll keep it in mind for when I write my report to Celestia!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: This little geode I wear is a trinket me and my friends got at Camp Everfree
case.state: You really have to demonstrate that for me in a controlled environment sometime, Pinkie.
Oh yes! Sunset mentioned them on one of her messages to me, can I get a closer look to it after the game ends?
Pinkie, please...no cupcakes...
Pinkie, are you alright? You look kinda dizzy...
Don't be ridiculous Pinkie, Pinkamena is just your full name! Snap out of it!
There is a Cheese Sandwich on this world too? I guess I shouldn't be too surprised, there seems to be one of everyone that is also back in Equestria
Pinkie... You already give a special discout to everyone you attend at Sugar Cube Corner...
Not really, Pinkie, I was just passing by and ~player~ asked me if I wanted to play for a bit, so I accepted!
Rarity! It's always nice to come back and see you... though I never expected to find you here of all places!
I don't know if it is dark, but a lot of the people in the Inventory do seem to have some sort of magic. I just wish I could use mine too...
Oh! Where did this other girl come from? Is she a friend of yours?
Your friend is so energetic! It reminds me a bit of a certain Pink friend of mine...
Pleasure to meet you, Ochako. You can just call me Twilight. Being called a princess still feels weird for me.
Hehe, I think I understand what you mean. Back when I first got my wings, they kept spreading open when I was trying to sleep because I hadn't gotten used to them.
Are you sure about that gym thing, trainer? I remember one time Rainbow Dash tried to take me to one, but started screaming at me after I tried to take off my clothes...
I think my friends from this world like to play volleyball. I'm sure that information you just said will help me convince them to play without those uncomfortable swimsuits of theirs.
Wait a second, you also have a multi-colored mane down there, Zizou? Well I guess it makes sense, it must be the equivalent of tail hair back home...
I've beaten magic-eating centaurs, shape-shifting emotion-eaters, mad gods and even traveled through time... I don't think you scare me, Revy.
Oh, you two already know each other? This game must be more fun with friends!
Yes! Celestia would be so proud of this hand!
The other day I ate a thing called "hamburger" which was very similar to the hayburgers back in equestria. It was delicious, but... It's just a name right? You people aren't really carnivores, right?
Just out of curiosity, there haven't been any more magical emergencies in this world that need my attention right?
So, I was wondering if someone could explain to me why all you people use so many layers of clothing? Is your skin super delicate or something?
Hello everyone, my name is Twilight Sparkle. It will be a pleasure to play with you.
Well, there is no such thing as a perfect game.
Me then? Alright what should I start with?
Alright! Time to get more comfortable then!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Have you been doing well in school? Phwwh... I'm assuming you haven't. Phwwwh...
case.state: I'll have you know that I'm a princess! And I graduated at the top of my class, thank you very much!

case.state: I'm not from here, Jura...I thought that was obvious.

case.state: I don't really know, Jura... People over at CHS are all different kinds of colors but here in the inventory I seem to be the odd one out...

I... have no Idea what a "youkai" is, Miko...

All right, this will be a good chance to see the differences between mares and stallions stripping.
I may not know a lot about a male human's body, but I sure am willing to see more of it right now!
So heroes exist in this world? Does that mean you know the Power Ponies?
I've saved Equestria a couple of times. It was exhausting. It's technically my job, but I couldn't imagine having to do it once a week!
Being a hero in a world where most people don't have access to magic must be a breeze... Am I right?
I think ~name~ is the one who needs saving right now...
You seem to be pretty inteligent, ~name~. Mind if we share notes with me once the game ends?
Do you like books, ~name~? I have a whole library full of books!
I can sense you also share a passion for knowledge, ~name~!
You might be as smart as I am, but that won't help you for this game, ~name~!
It's always nice to have another bright mind around! This will make my research go much faster!
Do you have one of those magical information device thingies, ~name~? I would very much like to learn how to use one!
You might be as smart as I am, but that won't help you in this game, ~name~!
You might be smart, but as long as I'm here, you'll have to settle with second place!

You know, I'm starting to get the impression you're losing on purpose...

Xander, something about you reminds me of Spike.
And score one for Equestria!
I may not know a lot about a female human's body, but I sure am willing to see more of it right now!

You're so lucky...
Murder?! Hehe, you must have a really weird sense of humor... hehe... 'cause that was a joke, right?
Oh Chihiro came back! Just in time to reveal us your crotch!
Well, usually I'd recommend taking off something really tight like your bra or panties, but that armor sure looks like the first thing that should come off...
Daphne, you remind me a lot of my friend Rarity... if she were interested in chasing monsters, of course.
Nice to meet you, Dawn! Our names are like opposites!
Woah, no need for the knives! He's just doing his job, after all...
No clothing? Well, I guess you can take off fur if you want, but how exactly are you going to do that?
Wait, what do you mean, "bye"? We still have a game to play!
Wait, what's that on your chest Florina? Is that a...

case.targetSaying: Just who do you think
case.state: Right now, I think you are the one that lost the round, Franziska...
So I heard you can use magic in this world? You have to teach me sometime, because I can't seem to make it work here.
Are you going to use magic to strip now, Hermione?
I guess the mystery of who else is playing with us today won't last for much longer.
Oh don't worry Jura, I have lots of books about male genitalia I'll gladly share with you, we are both here to learn after all!
With those wings, I bet you're like a Breezie from my world!
Bless you!
You seem to be acting differently since you changed your hair color. Is there some kind of magic involved here?
Bless you! Again...
They didn't and now they do? Why? They had the right idea first!
There we go. See, Moon? Patience does reward in the end!
You finally did it, Moon! Congratulations!
Of course you're supposed to be enjoying it! After all, we came here to have fun!
Oh no! Not this world's Pinkie too...
Oh boy... here we go again...

Your skin tone doesn't seem natural for this world. Are you from Equestria like me?
Oh, I'm sorry, ~name~. You'll win next round for sure.
And score one for Equestria!
Well... what now?

I wonder how much longer she can keep doing it...
When I do my next friendship report, I'm definitely writing about this!
Now this is certainly worth taking notes of...
I might need to investigate about controling vines once I get back home...

case.alsoPlayingSaying: 101 uses for party balloons; self-pleasure!
case.state: I'm not sure if I want to know the other 100 uses...
Is that actually a book? Because I've never read it.

case.alsoPlayingSaying: I could share the other side of the balloon with someone by the way
case.state: Don't worry Pinkie, I think I'm fine like this...
I think I'll pass, Pinkie. I'd rather not find out what a balloon feels like in there with you on the other end generating friction.

case.alsoPlayingSaying: I once tried to see how many balloons I could fit at once
case.state: I really didn't need to know that, Pinkie. Now I'm curious.
I wonder if my Pinkie uses balloons like this...maybe I'll ask her.
I will never be able to look at balloons the same way...
I guess in a way, using a balloon is similar to using a magical aura dildo back home...
Are you sure that is safe, Pinkie?
It might look a bit odd, but you certainly seem to be enjoying yourself there...
So is this why Flash gave me that weird looking slimy balloon the other day? And I thought he just wanted to mate with me...
I can't believe a balloon is capable of capable of holding itself together with all that friction...
I really hope you don't do this with every balloon you have, Pinke...
That balloon won't last much longer at this rate...
These aren't the same type of balloons you use at your normal parties... Right?
Oh, I guess that's another way to do that in this world. This place is so weird sometimes...
Exploring your body with someone else must feel so good!
You two seem to be enjoying your "research" a lot!
I'd offer to join, but you know the Equestrian saying... "two is company, three's a crowd!
This is a type of "friendship" I'd like to learn more about...
Watching you two is like walking through Ponyville during Hearts and Hooves day...
Did someone cast a "Want It, Need It" spell on you two?
Not even Big Mac gets as "friendly" as you two during mating season...
You two must be great friends!
l want to try that next time I see Sunset Shimmer...
This shows how strong your friendship is!
Then again, this only proves how strong your friendship is, Mika. In fact, I think l want to try that next time I see Sunset Shimmer...
I'd be careful with that...
Definitely taking notes. This is very interesting magic.
Are you sure you want to put that there?
I wonder if I have a similar connection to the Element of Magic?
It's almost like a unicorn horn...but less pointy.
I wonder what makes the gem so sensitive?
Would you mind if I took a look at that later? After you've...cleaned it?
I simply must study this new type of magic!

case.targetSaying: A-anyone else wanna
case.state: I think I'll pass, Sayaka...you look like you're okay on your own.

case.targetSaying: I wonder if this would feel the same in anyone elseâ€™s mouth?
case.state: Normally I'd volunteer for an experiment like that, but that gem looks pretty fragile...
I think ~name~ is getting close now!
She's really getting into it now..
Wow I think she is not even hearing us anymore!
Wow, that looked really fun! I might have to try that myself before I go back to having hooves.
That was great! Could you please give it another go? For science?
I think I want to give that a go myself.
Very informative. And that leg twitch after you reached climax was super cute!
I kinda want to lose now just to try that.
So that's how it ends when you have fingers!
Time to come together!
Oh my... And they say biology is boring...
That was certainly different... Do you think you can send a couple of vines to do the same to me? Without the whole being dropped on my head afterwards thing, of course...
Ahh, that scream... Either this body's ears are too sensitive or that was way too loud.
I loved how your ears kept twitching all the time... Now I want to do the same while I'm ponied up to see if my ears do that too...
Elizabeth, you definitely have to show me how to do that!
That was pawsome! ... Yeah.. I'm not good at making puns... cat-related or otherwise...
You have a beautiful voice, Florina. You should join the Rainbooms!
That was excellent! I can tell you had lots of experience with this sort of thing before!
Watching you hang up there doing that reminded me of the time Applejack used her rope to tie me in her barn and started... Sorry, I'm getting distracted here. Let's get back to the game.
Would you mind using that same spell on me once this game is over?
Thanks for that incredible show, Juri. Your body seems to have great flexibility!
Are you okay there, Korra? Your eyes went white for a moment.
Well, this must be awkward for you... Hmmm, welcome back?... And bless you...
Don't worry, Moon, I contacted Zecora while you were touching yourself. She should be here after the game, and we'll fix you up with one of her potions.
Was that what they call "using an assist"?
That play was incredible, Nagisa! Mind if I write to Celestia about it?
Pinkie! Thank Celestia you're back to normal! I was really worried!...That looked like it felt pretty good though...
Your friendship really is magic!
That was amazing! You even had a magic aura around you when you climaxed. Really made me miss being back home...
This might be a bit too late to mention it, but I just noticed you could have used that collar to be in the game for another round.
That soul gem seems very intensely connected to you! I would be very interested in further study of it.
That is going to be a lot of information to add to my reports. I'd also add what you were talking about if I had any clue what it all was.
A dancing masturbation, that's a first. For both my world and this world too.
That was great, Sola! I especially liked those magic sparkles when you were touching yourself.
With a show like that, I bet the people watching us must be very entertained!
That was quick indeed. But in a good way!
That fall looked like it hurt a bit! Are you okay, Ochako?
This was so informative! Thanks a lot, trainer.
Maybe you should invite this "Twilight Princess" next game so I can meet her.
Turns out I was prepared for this!
Oh I've won already? But I didn't even get to take off anything. I swear I'm not a cheater!
Nothing would make me happier than to be your friend, Saki, and I can't wait to present you to the rest of the girls!
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 20%.
Maybe changing ~cards~ will make this better?
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 69%.
~cards~ more cards will increase my odds of winning by 85%!
With ~cards~ cards I should be fine.
Exchanging ~cards~ cards should be the best course of action here.
I'll need ~cards~ for this to work.
I'll take ~cards~!
Almost perfect... One please!
I don't think I'll need it, but I'll change one...
Changing this one won't hurt...
Pretty good! I'll change one...
This hand is ready, I'll still change one just for the sake of it
Don't change a thing please!!
Oh yes! I'm fine like this...
Perfect, I won't change any cards...
By Celestia! I won't need to change cards, thank you...
Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...
4, like the number of hooves I had back home...
How about ~cards~?
~cards~ should do the trick!
Can I get ~cards~ cards over here?
Oh for Celestias... I'll take ~cards~...
Hmmm... nothing seems usefull here... ~cards~!
No good... maybe ~cards~ will fix it!
I'll take ~cards~ please...
~cards~ cards, dealer!
Don't change a thing please!!

Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...
Don't change a thing please!!
Oh yes! I'm fine like this...

Wow! Now this is what I call good luck...

Looks like someone else will be stripping this turn.
With these cards, I have a high probability of winning.
Celestia would be proud of this hand.
I've read enough about poker to know this is a great hand.
This hand is as magic as friendship!
If my calculations are right, there is no way I will lose this hand.
You can call me the princess of friendship... and poker.
My time to shine!
These cards are almost as good as a new friend!
With this hand, not even Chrysalis and her army could defeat me!
For Equestria and all the ponies I represent, I will not let this hand go to waste.
I'm the T to the WILIGHT, and ain't no other person got a hand like me. I'm Twilightlicious!
You won't be getting any more of my clothing while I have these cards!
Well you already know my name is Twilight. Still, pleasure to meet you.
I like your glasses, Mei! Where did you get them?
Well you already know my name is Twilight. Still, pleasure to meet you.
They're not exactly as exciting as reading, but they will do.
This should be enough to get me to next round.
This should be okay.
This is passable.
Back in Equestria, Rarity sometimes hosts a game where the penalty for losing a round is putting on a piece of clothing.
Hmmm, maybe if I hadn't skipped a chapter, I would have known how to get more out of this hand.
This hand is okay I guess...
Maybe I shouldn't have taken that card out? Whatever, this will work anyway.
This is fine... so long as someone else has a worse hand, you're safe, Twilight.
Focus, Twilight. You can do it.
This hand will need to work for now.
Don't give up hope yet, Twilight. You have come out of worse situations.
Think positive, Twilight. There's still a pretty big chance that one of your opponents has a worse hand.
They're not exactly as exciting as a perfect score on an exam, but they will do.
They're not exactly as exciting as a good book, but they will do.
They're not exactly as exciting as... Wait? What do you mean I'm being annoying?
Don't panic, Twilight, think of what Pinkie would do... Actually, let's not think about what Pinkie would do...
This just won't cut it.
Well this is weird.
Oh no, I didn't mean to trade that card away.
Oh no. Quick! Think of what Celestia told you to do in this situation.
Even with all I have learned, this will be a difficult situation to get out of.
We have a crisis on our hooves!
Discord is responsible for this hand, isn't he?
These cards! They're awful! They're horrible! They're tragic!
I guess I don't have all the answers...
Somewhere, someplace, Tirek is laughing at my poor luck...
I gotta think of something! Thinkthinkthinkthinkthink Twilight, think!
Oh, good. Great.
This hand is terrible, and I don't think I can come up with a counterspell in time!
Clock is ticking, Twilight... Clock... is... TICKING!
These are bad! Flim and Flam aren't behind this game, are they?
Just because everyone expects something from you doesn't mean it's guaranteed to happen.
For Celestia's sake! Who is dealing these cards!?
Come on, Twilight! You just have to keep it together. Keep. It. Together!
Just remember what Cadence told you and breathe, Twilight...
Please have something worse than me.
This was definitely not what I wanted.
Not good at all.
Well I guess I did want to wear as little clothing as possible after all.
Well, I guess I wouldn't mind getting a little more comfortable!
Well you already know my name is Twilight. Still, pleasure to meet you.
I want to take the chance to thank you people for helping me with my research, I'll be sure to credit everyone here!
Awww, and I was looking forward to study your body from the front too...
Finally someone with a normal name around here, Hello Ms. Alter, my name is Twilight Sparkle!
What book said that? Tell me! I need to read it!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Sometimes "just okay" is good enough, not everything has to be perfect.
case.state: What do you mean "just okay"? You should always try to get as close to perfect as possible!
Oh, I guess we we read the same book before coming here, Corrin!
Huey is a weird name for a pegasus, though... or any type of pony in general. Did he grow on Cloudsdale or somewhere else?
"Los Angeles"? Oh! That must be this world's version of "Los Pegasus"
Woah! Where did those ropes come from? Was that what you were doing when you moved your hands before?
Don't ask me, I'm not from here either, Jura...
Don't worry Lotte, I may not have read this "Nightfall" book you speak of, but I'm always open for new reading material!
I'm pretty sure they're just "playing cards", Lotte. But if it makes you feel better, keep singing!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Were I to know clothing would play such a large part of tonightâ€™s activities
case.state: I think you look fancy enough like that, Miko!
Your consort? Ah I see! I can't wait to eventually find my own somewhere, maybe ~player~ could be a good start!
That is a handy tip. I'll keep it in mind for when I write my report to Celestia!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: This little geode I wear is a trinket me and my friends got at Camp Everfree
case.state: You really have to demonstrate that for me in a controlled environment sometime, Pinkie.
Oh yes! Sunset mentioned them on one of her messages to me, can I get a closer look to it after the game ends?
Pinkie, please...no cupcakes...
Pinkie, are you alright? You look kinda dizzy...
Don't be ridiculous Pinkie, Pinkamena is just your full name! Snap out of it!
There is a Cheese Sandwich on this world too? I guess I shouldn't be too surprised, there seems to be one of everyone that is also back in Equestria
Not really, Pinkie, I was just passing by and ~player~ asked me if I wanted to play for a bit, so I accepted!
I don't know if it is dark, but a lot of the people in the Inventory do seem to have some sort of magic. I just wish I could use mine too...
Oh! Where did this other girl come from? Is she a friend of yours?
Your friend is so energetic! It reminds me a bit of a certain Pink friend of mine...
Hehe, I think I understand what you mean. Back when I first got my wings, they kept spreading open when I was trying to sleep because I hadn't gotten used to them.
Are you sure about that gym thing, trainer? I remember one time Rainbow Dash tried to take me to one, but started screaming at me after I tried to take off my clothes...
I think my friends from this world like to play volleyball. I'm sure that information you just said will help me convince them to play without those uncomfortable swimsuits of theirs.
Wait a second, you also have a multi-colored mane down there, Zizou? Well I guess it makes sense, it must be the equivalent of tail hair back home...
I've beaten magic-eating centaurs, shape-shifting emotion-eaters, mad gods and even traveled through time... I don't think you scare me, Revy.
Yes! Celestia would be so proud of this hand!
The other day I ate a thing called "hamburger" which was very similar to the hayburgers back in equestria. It was delicious, but... It's just a name right? You people aren't really carnivores, right?
Just out of curiosity, there haven't been any more magical emergencies in this world that need my attention right?
So, I was wondering if someone could explain to me why all you people use so many layers of clothing? Is your skin super delicate or something?
I have to say, even something as simple as removing my panties has made me feel so free!
I think I should just come panty-less next time, it feels so good!
I still can't believe the look everyone else gave when I removed something as nonimportant as my panties...

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Have you been doing well in school? Phwwh... I'm assuming you haven't. Phwwwh...
case.state: I'll have you know that I'm a princess! And I graduated at the top of my class, thank you very much!

case.alsoPlayingSaying: ...I had no idea Earth girls came in so many...flavors. How'd your parents pick
case.state: I'm not from here, Jura...I thought that was obvious.

case.alsoPlayingSaying: ...So, uh, that skin color. Am I missing something? Is this a common look on Earth?
case.state: I don't really know, Jura... People over at CHS are all different kinds of colors but here in the inventory I seem to be the odd one out...

case.alsoPlayingSaying: Gotta be honest, girlie, I'm out of the loop on what Earth people look like. Is that complexion of yours...normal?
case.state: I don't really know, Jura... People over at CHS are all different kinds of colors but here in the inventory I seem to be the odd one out...

case.alsoPlayingSaying: that you keep going on about? Is a "pony" a purple Earthling? I'm totally lost here.
case.state: Pony is just like a smaller horse, back in my world everyone is a pony! This dimention seems to have evolved from apes though... really strange if you ask me...
If you still have your doubts, I can always bring you to my world, you'll probably end up as a pony too once you pass through the portal however...
That must be because I'm from another dimension! In Equestria we are mainly earth ponies, pegasi, and unicorns.

I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
This is the bra that the portal made for me. I don't understand why I needed one at all, though.
Isn't it strange that the portal to the human world made clothes for me? Why would anypony mind if they saw me emerge naked?
Time for me loosen this chest restraint.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Applejack let me borrow this, but it's a little too big for me anyway.
Normally you'd find this bra on my friend Applejack. I think the plaid pattern really suits her.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
It was very sweet of Rainbow Dash to let me borrow her sports bra, but it's sooo tight on me. How much larger are mine, I wonder?
Was Rainbow expecting me to exercise with her when she lent me this bra? I can barely walk on these legs, so she'll have to wait until I'm more used to this body.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
For some reason, Fluttershy was very embarrassed to let me borrow her bra. Her face was red for so long that I was worried she was coming down with something.
The bra that Fluttershy lent me is so pretty. Who knew she had a thing for pink lace?
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Pinkie Pie let me borrow this bra. I had to dump all of the party supplies out of it first, though. Hopefully I got all of the confetti.
Leave it to Pinkie to lend me the most comfortable bra I've ever tried. It's a long way from not wearing one, though.
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
This bra that Rarity lent me is almost all the way see-through. It's so funny being able to see my nipples all squished up against the fabric.
I don't understand this bra that Rarity let me borrow. Why wear something see-through if you could just wear nothing at all?
I'll be glad to get rid of this stupid "bra" too. I constantly feel like my chest is being strangled.
Sunset Shimmer let me borrow this one. The fiery pattern matches her hair and cutie mark so well.
Sunset lent me this bra. It's a wonder she can even stand wearing one, being from Equestria and all. I wonder if she had as hard a time as I have adapting to clothing?
I bought these "pasties" because they looked more comfortable then regular human underwear, but when I showed the other girls they all told me I shouldn't wear them. I wonder why not?
There isn't a rule about taking these off first, is there?
That feels so much better. I can breathe down there now.
The breeze is nice and comfortable. I don't understand why you humans wear such things.
I don't understand this game. It is totally normal to be naked in Equestria.
You all seem so surprised. Is something weird happening behind me or what?
I would if it were up to me Beatrix, but I am trying to win this game!
Don't worry, Chun-Li. You wouldn't believe how refreshing that was!
Wait, are you telling me there are pegasi in this world too?
Exactly! I'm glad you share my point of view Joey.
I'm pretty sure I would be fine. If anything, getting my skirt lifted by air while being pantyless must feel really refreshing!
So tell me, Mei, are you... Wait, what happened? Why are you looking at me like that?
Nope! Not human... Pony!
Is something wrong, Moon? I mean, I understand you wanting to get more comfortable, but it's not something to get mad about...

case.targetSaying: Just who do you think

Your skin tone doesn't seem natural for this world. Are you from Equestria like me?
Oh, I'm sorry, ~name~. You'll win next round for sure.
Well... what now?

Wow, it's so small that I didn't even see you were wearing it.

"You're so cute when you think you know what you're talking about."

Great job!

Cute!

I guess that's good. Though I still feel you can free yourself more.

Remember, the less you wear, the more comfortable you will feel!

You made them look really nice, Mavis!

Yes, join me and feel the breeze pass over your skin. Doesn't that make you feel more free?

Wait, so are you taking off your skirt now?

See? Doesn't it feel much better now?
Yes! Feel the breeze passing through. Isn't it great?
Feeling better now?
Do you mind if I take a closer look at whatever you take off next in order to take notes?
That's the spirit! Don't you feel a lot more comfortable now?

~Name~, I think that we could be very good friends!

Yes, join me and feel the breeze pass over your skin. Doesn't that make you feel more free?

Hehe, your underwear looks like it was made out of disco balls. I like it!

Well, I remember seeing Fluttershy using some very small clothes when she was working as a model for Photo Finish. Then again, since we're naked most of the time, I guess it's just not the same thing.
Glad to see you understand my point of view. Wait, you didn't mean to take off your hoodie before your shoes?
Just underwear and stockings? Not the most comfortable combo, but one of the cutest for sure!
What happens if a piece of clothing runs out of durability anyways? Does it just vanish?

With a body like that, you must be as strong as Applejack!
Which is especially weird considering about 80% of our population is female.
But you look even cuter like that!

I would remove more items together too, but I want to win more than I want to get comfortable.

And you still have even more stuff under that?!

Wow! It's been a while since I've seen a mare with two fur colors. Hanako, you must be treated like an exotic beauty in this world!
Seriously Hanako, you look beautiful. I'm actually kinda jealous!
Took you long enough, huh? Not that I mind much, though.
The disguise worked... Although I don't know why you'd bring one to a strip poker game. It's in the name, after all...
Neat trick! And Rainbow Dash said clowns were boring...
I didn't know you could put stuff into your clothes. Maybe I should start using my panties to store things too!

At least you're not a dragon or you'd be shooting fire on top of the transformations...
Does that mean you also represent an element of harmony?
All matching! Looks a bit uncomfortable, but I guess that's the sacrifice required to look good!
You don't seem to be using these "bras" everyone else seems to have, Though I'm not sure what you have is more comfortable either...
Purple hair and light purple underwear... All you need is a fully white skin and you'd look just like Rarity!
Yes! You look so much better now!
It's just as I say to my friend Fluttershy, you have to be brave!
And they definitely look cute!

Oh it's not as bad as I expected, I think I actually kinda like it!
Oh! Finally Rarity decided to show us her flank, but again, no cutie mark... strange...
You have a very pretty face. I don't know why you were trying to hide it!
That stockings-underwear combo looks so cute! I wouldn't mind walking around in this world using just that.
That's... an interesting way to remove your clothing, looks more like you got split from it rather than strip willingly off from it...
A magical transformation! I bet your friend support was enough to make you pony up! Where are your pony ears though?

Hey! That reminds me of the swimsuit that the me of this world has. Did Rarity make yours too?
Whoops, I think the magic of those potions is starting to take effect on Sei.

That must be a real nuisance. You know, having to carry that thing around everywhere.
Velma has the right idea!

On one hand, I thought your dress was made of more than one piece. On the other, I'm glad you finished removing jewelry and started getting comfortable.
I don't even know why male humans wear chest coverings, or the females either for that matter.
So do you males also wear these weird straps on your chest? No?
Trust me, you'll feel much better once you remove your ~clothing~.

You look great like that!

Who knew all I had to do to see a human's penis was to just take off my panties!

I wonder how big the size difference between humans and stallions is.

Don't worry ~name~! You still have a chance to win!

Join me and feel the fresh air passing by your body!

That horn is so small... but I'm sure that it will grow bigger as you get older!

Awww, it's almost as cute as Spike when he's sleeping...
OH MY GOSH, IT'S SO ADORABLE!
Oh my, did you fall under the effects of a poison joke plant? I heard those cause a lot of shrinkage.

Pinkie! Thank Celestia you're back to normal! I was really worried!...That looked like it felt pretty good though...
Your friendship really is magic!

That soul gem seems very intensely connected to you! I would be very interested in further study of it.

Nothing would make me happier than to be your friend, Saki, and I can't wait to present you to the rest of the girls!
Don't worry, sooner or later, all villians fall to the power of friendship!

scene.name: Start
scene.directive: ~player~, do you have a moment?
You did really well in the game! Congratulations on winning!
I was just wondering...
Well, I'm new to this world, and I don't have anywhere to go home to yet...
I really love books, but they make for a lousy mattress. I don't want to have to sleep in the library again tonight.
If it's okay to ask, could I maybe sleep over at your house tonight?

scene.name: house transition
scene.directive: Wow, nice house! Is it really okay if I stay with you tonight?
Don't get me wrong, I love spending all night learning, but my previous sleeping arrangements did leave a lot to be desired!
Actually... There's something I'd like to learn about that isn't in those books...
Everypony had to touch themselves at that game we played, and it was the first time I'd ever seen it done with human fingers.
But you didn't get to do it. I would have liked to have seen that...

scene.name: Open shirt
scene.directive: I was wondering...
Maybe we could do an information exchange...
You could find all about my human body with me...
And in return I could learn what yours feels like...
And maybe I could see what it looks like when you pay the "penalty" for losing the card game?
When I did it, it felt really good!
A very long time later...
Wow, our learning games are amazing! I feel a very special friendship forming!
I'll have to bring you to Equestria to meet the rest of my friends! How would you like to come with me and do some exploring?
Now let's get back to the fun! What did you want to show me next?

epilogue.title: Me, Herself and Her Other Self

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: (A few weeks after the game...)
Trust me, you are going to love the me of this dimension.
And don't worry, she might be a bit more shy than me...
...but I already talked to her about you and she agreed to do this.
So there shouldn't be any problems!
Hey girls, could you lend me Twilight for a few minutes?
Sure thing princess!..
By the way Pinkie, what was that thing about an "Inventory you and Rarity were talking about?

scene.name: Privacy
scene.directive: This place should be private enough.
Glad you came, Twilight! This is the guy I talked to you about the other day.
I can't believe I agreed with you to do this. I have a boyfriend, you know?
Though I guess if someone knew how to convince me to do something this crazy, it would be myself.
Boyfriend? You mean that guy you have gone out with ONCE and never even speak of?
Forget about Timber.
Anyways, remember how I told you I got my own personal harem back in Equestria ever since I got my title of princess?
I think it's time for you to start your own one here.
And I think ~name~ will be the perfect start!
Fine. Let's just take it slow...
I don't have much experience with this...
or rather any at all...
Are you seriously telling me you're still a virgin?
This is even worse than I thought!
Quick, ~name~! Take off your clothes!
And you Twilight, get down on your knees!

scene.name: Double BJ
scene.directive: How are you feeling there, Twilight? Everything good?
It tastes a bit strange, but I think I like it...
Good, because we are barely starting here...

scene.name: TEETS
scene.directive: How am I going? Am I doing it right?
Guessing by the look on ~name~'s face, I think you're doing great!

scene.name: Presenting
scene.directive: This is it, Twilight!
After this there will be no turning back. Are you ready?
Do it.
I want ~name~ to take my first time...
That's the spirit!
Well, ~name~. You heard her, don't make her wait any longer!

scene.name: Sci-twi
scene.directive: AHHH!
Please keep going... A bit faster now...
Yes! Keep going!
You've been there for a while now. Are you doing okay?
OH YES!!! DON'T STOP I FEEL LIKE I'M GOING TO...
I'm so glad to hear that.
And ~name~, I hope you don't run out of stamina because I'll be waiting for you after you finish with her...

scene.name: Princess Twi
scene.directive: Just as good as I remembered you, ~name~!
Oh yes!
I can feel him about to cum, Twilight!
Come closer and get ready to receive it with me.
See Twilight, wasn't that great?
It was amazing, I can't wait to do it again sometime!
I better go back though, the rest of the girls must be starting to get worried about where I went...
You might want to clean yourself before going back...
Hehe, true. And ~name~, thank you so much for being so careful with me, I'm never going to forget this experience.
What about your boyfriend though?
Timber Spruce? Pff... He could go make love to a tree for all I care...
From now on, ~name~ is the only one I care for.
